resources.string:
"Jazba (Annual Cultural Festival).

"
Gandhinagar Institute of Technology, managed by Platinum Foundation, celebrates its grand gala annual cultural festival JAZBA. It showcases more than fifteen events including Antakshari, Quiz, Rangoli, Debate, T-shirt Painting, Singing, Dancing, Skit, Mr and Miss GIT, Face Painting, Cooking, Sand Art, Bhookhad, Laggy Cricket and many more. The day events are followed by musical evening program in which multi-talented students from various branches perform in various events like Skit, Solo and Duet Singing, Solo and Group Dance etc. Actress from movie and television industry are invited to inspire the students for culture and co-curricular activities. Ms. Sonal Chauhan (Jannat Movie Actreess), Mr. Ranvijay Singh (Actor and MTV Roadies Host), Hard Kaur (Singer, Rapper and Musician), Mr. Rajdeep Chatrerjee(Indion Idol Fame Singer) and many more become a part of this grand event.
.

"
